friends.name: Maureen Wroblewitz
friends.message: Hi! It's your girl Maureen. And I've just won Asia's Next Top Model. I. I kennat. That question is so hard. So I'm only gonna guess. It's {choice}. Thank you so much for the support. Ich liebe dich Philippinen!

friends.name: Bike
friends.message: Kahit na pinagbili mo (Yoboness) na ako, tutulungan pa rin kita masagot ang tanong na ito. Tingin ko {choice} ang sagot kasi hindi niya ako iiwan.

friends.name: Sapporo
friends.message: Hik! Hik! Hik! Ayy bote nga lang pala ako. Bakit ako lasing? Try mo {choice}.

friends.name: Sandara Park
friends.message: Annyeong! Nakita mo ba si Mario Maurer? Nasa kanya na kasi ang lahat pati dandruff. 'Di ko alam kung ano ang in or out sa mga choices te. Feeling ko {choice} ang tamang sagot. Annyeong!.

friends.name: Kendall Jenner
friends.message: Hi my other self! I think the answer is {choice}. I can feel it! Good luck!
